item.title: 1 - The GAMBIT Interface
item.description: 1 - The GAMBIT Interface â“˜ Info: Unless otherwise stated, all relative file paths used in the following tutorials will be relative to the GAMBIT installation directory. Introduction to the interface The GAMBIT interface has two main parts: a master initialisation file which is a YAML file containing the inputs from the user, and the GAMBIT executable which has a number of command line options. Using this interface, the GAMBIT workflow consists of the following steps:
